name: FlowMan
short_description: Stores Cisco NetFlow v5 packets to a PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, CSV  or raw file backend. Has the ability to store to different backends based on the source router. Can forward packets to another NetFlow server, and writes to CSV files if a backend dies
